author: Like Stories of Old
description:
BRING THEM DOWN and the other films mentioned are streaming on MUBI in the Netherlands and many other countries. Start your free month of great cinema now at https://mubi.com/likestoriesofold 

The new hospital show The Pitt is unlike anything I've ever seen, and I realized it's because its story is not structured like a typical hospital show. No, in a wildly inspired move, they structured this one like the Battle of Helm's Deep from The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, and the result is absolutely insane!

Watch this video ad-free on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/lsoo-they-remade-the-battle-of-helms-deep-in-a-hospital-show-and-its-insane

0:00 An ER Drama built like an Epic Battle
1:56 Prelude: The Build-Up
2:20 The Greater War
3:05 Emerging Threat
4:06 Quick Note on Spoilers
4:38 Phase 1: Preparation
6:12 Phase 2: The Battle Begins
6:24 Deflection of the First Wave
6:59 First Breaking Points
7:23 Rising Heroism
9:03 Becoming a Collective Force
9:54 Desperation
11:20 Phase 3: Fi
title: They Remade the Battle of Helm's Deep in a Hospital Show, and It's Insane
